page.title: 15PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: says "1,2,3 in, save all" then the counter has to count again. To win you have to get to the post without being spotted. {SPACE INVADERS.}You need to have a ball and a wall,and you have to hit the people who are standing against the wall.One of the people has the ball and has to throw it at the others. {LEAPFROG.}Some people bend down and grab their ankles.Then people run and put their hands on those people's backs that are bending over.Those people jump over them and go to the back. {FIVES.}If you miss the wall five times then you are out.Five people can play this game.The game goes on until you lose all your lives. The last person to be out is the winner.
